author: Nick Nairn
method: Blend the mango, honey, yoghurt, soya milk, coconut milk, ice and lime juice in a liquidiser until smooth. Pour into a tall smoothie glass and garnish with a mint sprig.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz mango, peeled and chopped ,  2 tbsp runny honey,  50g/1¾oz soya yoghurt ,  100ml/3½floz soya milk,  100ml/3½floz coconut milk,  1 small handful ice,  ½ lime, juice only,  sprig of mint
